name: StickSlam
description: So Your In a Room... Lets put some stick figures in pain and suffer! Press R to spawn in stick figures Press E to explode! Press Q to summon a lightning bolt! the blue thing around and put it on the figures you can drag the rocket if you click it it will move you can drag the figures around press 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8,9, 0 the change the background and the effects in the background appear if a Stick Figure hits the ground so yeah Enjoy! New Update everyday! Current Version: 0.2
